title: How to correct "unsupported File" error messages in messenger.
content: About two months ago I started getting error messages titled "Unsupported File" with the text  saying "message expired or not available.". I searched the web and found suggestions, but they do not work.  I tried clearing the cache, checking for updates, deleting and reloading contacts.  Deleting and reloading seemed to work for a while, but now the error have began again.  Is there a permanent fix?
